summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of alleys in block 9, Hillman City Division No. 1, being the alleys between Rainier Avenue and 46th Avenue South, between Orcas Street and Mead Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93119 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
